Package org.springframework.social.vkontakte.api

Spring Social's Service API for VKontakte

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FeedOperations
    News Feed functions, modelled after Facebook's API.
    FriendsOperations
    Defines operations for interacting with a user's friends.
    PhotosOperations  
    UsersOperations
    User operations.
    VKontakte
    Interface specifying a basic set of operations for interacting with VKontakte.
    WallOperations
    Interface defining operations that can be performed on a VKontakte wall.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationAttachment
    Application image attachment.
    Attachment
    VK post attachment.
    AudioAttachment
    Audio attachment.
    DocumentAttachment
    Document attachment.
    Error
    Represents error that VKontakte can return.
    GraffitiAttachment
    Attachment associated with an external photo.
    LinkAttachment
    Attachment associated with a website link.
    NewsPost
    Defines post information for News Feed, slightly different from Post.
    NoteAttachment
    Note attachment.
    PageAttachment
    Wiki page reference attachment.
    PhotoAttachment
    Attachment associated with an external photo.
    PollAttachment
    Poll.
    Post
    Model class representing an entry in a wall.
    Post.Likes  
    Post.Reposts  
    PostStatus
    Posting status; either have valid postId OR PostStatus.isProcessing() is true (for delaying posting).
    PostStatusResponse
    VKontakte post status.
    UploadServer  
    VideoAttachment
    Video attachment.
    VKArrayResponse<T>
    VKontakte list-based response.
    VKGenericResponse
    Used for manual JSON conversions within the response.
    VKontakteDate  
    VKontakteErrorHandler
    Subclass of DefaultResponseErrorHandler that handles errors from VKontakte's API, interpreting them into appropriate exceptions.
    VKontakteProfile
    Model class containing a VKontakte user's profile information.
    VKontakteProfiles
    Collection of profiles.
    VKResponse
    Generic class for VKontakte response objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Attachment.AttachmentType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    VKontakteErrorException
    VKontakte returned error.
